resources.string:
Welcome to the Keet Seel Erosion App! The purpose of the app is to help Citizen Scientists like you contribute to a photo time-series of erosion-sensitive sites in Keet Seel canyon. On your hike, will take photos in six locations. You will upload the photos our database when you return and are connected to wi-fi or cell service. 


1. Use the map to find each location. You can click the locations to see an example photo and a description. Try to match the example photo as best you can.

 2. Use your phone's camera to take a landscape photo. 2. Enter the date the photos were taken to enable the select buttons. 

 3. Use the Select buttons to select your photo. Once a photo is selected, the select button will turn green and the upload button will be enabled.

 4. Use the upload button when you are connected to the internet. A checkmark will appear if the upload was successful.
